The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 19 December is 1,711,738 (3,041.1 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 14 December, there were 135,392 new confirmed cases (240.5 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 07 December, there were 90,748 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 49% (44,644 extra cases).
